title: (x) Square sans and semiserif - Digital Sans, Midnight Kernboy {Florian}
content:
Hi, i need some font expertise. Does anyone know the fonts?

Font 1 is the first word. Font 2 is the 2nd and 3rd word.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Type1_3851.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Type2_4791.jpg)

 [‹ Vintage compressed sans serif headline, not Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36827 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fanzine 137 customized Futura? - yes {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36818 "Go to next forum topic")
author: arienstone

comments.content: The first is [Digital Sans™](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/), the second [Midnight Kernboy](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/midnight-kernboy/), according to [WhatTheFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202200736/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/).
2 and 3 looks like “city”, remove a couple of random serifs and you are there...
Wow, thanks a lot for the help! I think it’s close enough, if not, exactly as the one it says on WhatTheFont.
